title: Office Equipment Sales & Distribution
description: Comprehensive sales and distribution of quality office equipment from authorized suppliers including Sharp, Panasonic, HP, and Fargo.

title: UPS & Power Solutions
description: Online/Industrial UPS systems, inverter batteries, and power management solutions for uninterrupted business operations.

title: Air Conditioning Systems
description: Sales, installation and maintenance of air conditioning systems from trusted brands like Panasonic and Sharp.

title: Interactive Technology Solutions
description: Advanced interactive touch screens, digital displays, video walls and intelligent automation systems.

title: ID Card & Security Systems
description: Fargo ID card printing machines, POS systems, scanners and security hardware for business operations.

title: Maintenance & Support Services
description: Comprehensive after-sales service, preventive maintenance, and technical support with trained engineers across Nigeria.
